name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At around 9 pm on the 29th, a male student from Wuhan City College in Hubei Province was reported online to have jumped off a building in Wuhan, Hubei Province. It was suspected that this was because he did not receive any salary for his internship at the school and had difficulty finding a job.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Russia, a man said he took a taxi from Red Square back to his hotel. The taxi app showed that it only cost 400 rubles, but the taxi driver charged him 5,000 rubles! The man said: I will be angry with anyone who talks about the friendship between China and Russia. "The driver also asked us if we were Chinese. If we were Chinese, we would be ripped off." Netizens: Don't destroy the friendship between the two countries for this little money. Be aware of the overall situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 29, Guizhou. An uncle climbed a crane to ask for his hard-earned money. He said, "I will get tens of thousands of yuan today even if I risk everything." November 29, Qiannan, Guizhou. The Longli Guanyinshan Forest Town project owed wages. Workers stood on the roof and crane and shouted, "I want to go home for the New Year. Give me back my hard-earned money." November 28, Qianjiang, Hubei. Yuanlin Sake Co., Ltd. owed wages. Workers stood on the roof to ask for wages.
